name: Make-a Friend
description:
Do you often feel alone? Would you rather build a friend to accompany you?

Dig through the sand to find pieces to create yourself a little robot friend! But beware of the traps that the tide might bring to the shore.

Made by:

  • Priscila Cruz
  • Rubén de Haro
  • Laura Gámez
  • Hugo López
  • Daniel Morales
